{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Ideally, a loop can consist of inner loops to have a format:

FitLoop
BatchLoop
ClassicTrain
BatchLoop
StepLoop
ValidStepLoop

Which might have a structure:

{
"FitLoop": [
    "FitLoop (epoch)": [
        "ClassicTrain (train)": [
            "BatchLoop (batches)": [
                "StepLoop (pred)": [],
                "StepLoop (loss)": [],
                "StepLoop (backward)": [],
                "StepLoop (step)": [],
                "StepLoop (zero_grad)": []
            ]
        ],
        "ClassicTrain (valid)": [
            "BatchLoop (batches)": [
                "ValidStepLoop (pred)": [],
                "ValidStepLoop (loss)": [],
            ]
        ]
    ]
}
